data.text: @YahooEnt @Andy @SJP Maybe you should hear From someone who’s been on the set and knows SJP is a snot nose punk hidden underneath a lifetime of being referred to the ugliest woman in Hollywood.  https://t.co/KF0ymqwd5k

@YahooEnt @SJP @Andy You guys should pull this tweet as Kim is in crisis today.  Her brother is missing.  Door unlocked, phone/ wallet left out.  Pets unattended.  You may look like insensitive bullies if things go sideways for her family.
@YahooEnt @SJP @Andy Screw Kim Cattrall. Write her out and just proceed......

@charleneporterx @YahooEnt @SJP @Andy I don't want to argue w/ you. Throughout the 1st movie she ogled her neighbor & adopted a dog who liked to hump & left Smith. In the 2nd film she risked her professional career & freedom for sex. I don't see growth but if you do that's okay.
@charleneporterx @YahooEnt @SJP @Andy No, she left him by the end of the first film.

@YahooEnt @SJP @Andy I love Andy & SJP but enough with the attacks on Kim Cattrall. Her character was the only character that did not show growth or maturation in the SATC movies. I can imagine why she would not want to continue to play Samantha.
@YahooEnt @Andy @SJP Oh my god she needs to stop. The first movie was not good the second was awful. Stop. Stop.  Stop. Kim is smart for stepping away from this nonsense
@YahooEnt @SJP @Andy It's the golden girls part 3.  Wtf wants to see this crap still.    Dam Hollywood

@YahooEnt @SJP @Andy I'm with Kim on this one. Why not give the "Samantha Jones" role to a Black or Spanish woman. I mean the second movie was trash. Why NOT up the anty by adding some color. https://t.co/GSck275ZFj
